definition: Health, happiness, and good fortune; well-being: workers concerned with the welfare of their families.

a. Financial or other aid provided, especially by the government, to people in need.
b. See welfare work.
c. See corporate welfare.
(uncountable) Health, safety, happiness and prosperity; well-being in any respect.
(uncountable, chiefly US) Various forms of financial aid provided by the government to those who are in need of it (abbreviated form of Welfare assistance).
